articles.title: First They Fought About Masks. Then Over the Soul of the City. - The New York Times
articles.description: In Enid, Okla., pandemic politics prompted a fundamental question: What does it mean to be an American? Whose version of the country will prevail?

articles.title: Holland America cruise skips Mexico stop after positive Covid-19 tests - NBC News
